speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I wish to recognize Roxy Hammond, an intern in my Washington, DC, office, for all of the hard work she has done for me, my staff, and the State of South Dakota over the past several months.

Roxy is a graduate of Mitchell High School in Mitchell, SD. Currently she is attending South Dakota State University, where she is majoring in broadcast journalism, political science, and Spanish. She is a hard worker who has been dedicated to getting the most out of her internship experience.
I would like to extend my sincere thanks and appreciation to Roxy for all of the fine work she has done and wish her continued success in the years to come.
